code: import axios from'axios';var baseUrl="http://localhost:4000/api/comment/article/";export default{postComments:function postComments(id,comment,headers){return axios.post(baseUrl+id,{comment:comment},{headers:headers});},getComments:function getComments(id,headers){return axios.get(baseUrl+id,{headers:headers});},updateComments:function updateComments(id,commentid,comment,headers){return axios.put(baseUrl+id+'/'+commentid,{comment:comment},{headers:headers});},deleteComments:function deleteComments(id,commentid,headers){return axios.delete(baseUrl+id+'/'+commentid,{headers:headers});}};
